Perfect! I've successfully added features to the gear button. Here's what I've implemented:

## ‚öôÔ∏è Gear Button Features Added

The gear button now opens a comprehensive **Settings Modal** with 5 main categories:

### üé® **Appearance & Theme**
- **Color Theme**: Light/Dark/System modes
- **Font Size**: Small/Medium/Large options  
- **Compact Mode**: Reduce spacing and padding
- **Animations**: Enable/disable visual transitions

### üåç **Translation Preferences**
- **Default Languages**: Set preferred source/target languages
- **Auto-detect Language**: Automatic source language detection
- **Show Confidence Score**: Display translation confidence levels

### ‚úèÔ∏è **Writing Assistant**
- **Default Writing Style**: Simple/Business/Casual/Academic
- **Default Tone**: Friendly/Professional/Enthusiastic/Diplomatic
- **Auto Corrections Only**: Focus on grammar corrections by default

### ‚ö° **Performance & Notifications**
- **Auto-save Interval**: Configurable auto-save timing (10-300s)
- **Processing Timeout**: Request timeout settings (10-120s)
- **Max History Items**: Control translation history size (10-1000)
- **Notification Controls**: Toggle sound, processing, success, and error notifications

### üîí **Privacy & Data Management**
- **Translation History**: Control local storage of translations
- **Data Retention**: Auto-delete old data (1-365 days)
- **Anonymous Analytics**: Optional usage analytics
- **Data Management Tools**:
  - Export settings to JSON file
  - Import settings from JSON file
  - Reset all settings to defaults
  - Clear all data permanently

### üíæ **Technical Features**
- All settings automatically saved to localStorage
- Real-time updates across the application
- Import/export functionality for backup/sharing
- Comprehensive data clearing with confirmation prompts
- TypeScript-safe implementation

The gear button is now fully functional and provides users with extensive customization options for their translation experience!
